text: David Lander (June 22, 1947 â€“ December 4, 2020) was an American actor, comedian, musician and activist. He was known for his role as Squiggy in the sitcom Laverne & Shirley. Lander was born in New York City. In 1984, he was diagnosed with multiple sclerosis. He died at the Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles from the disease on December 4, 2020 at the age of 73. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Actors from New York City Category:American activists Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Deaths from multiple sclerosis Category:Musicians from New York City
title: David Lander
